job description:
Enervee is looking for an experienced data analyst to translate web engagement, digital marketing, e-commerce, and energy efficiency data into actionable dashboards and insights (using Looker) for our internal and external customers. You will be responsible for connecting with key stakeholders across business and technical teams to deliver Enervee’s customer behavior and energy savings insights via setup of an automated, intuitive and scalable data analytics and business intelligence platform. Most importantly, you’ll see your work have an immediate and tangible impact every day in a dynamic, fast-paced and growing company.

What you'll do:
  • Play a key role on optimizing Enervee’s data environment to work most effectively and efficiently with Looker and other data analytics tools
  • Manage requirements gathering, use cases and custom data requests across key technical and business stakeholders or customers
  • Develop a data model around stated use cases to capture clients KPIs and data transformations
  • Translating Enervee’s data into intuitive visualizations and dashboards for use by internal and external stakeholders
  • Act as primary liaison between the Customer Success, Sales, Business Development, Marketing, Product and the Technology teams
  • Document and communicate product feedback in order to improve user experience
  • Promote value-driven delivery, innovation and continuous improvement
Requirements
  • 5+ years of experience working in the SaaS and Data Analytics space
  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics, Physics, Computer Science, or equivalent
  • Experience working with Looker and other similar business intelligence software and big data analytics platform
  • A passion for exploring data and extracting valuable insights
  • Proven analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting expertise
  • Ability to learn and assimilate technical information quickly
  • Proficiency in SQL
  • Mac Savvy
  • Desire to work in an entrepreneurial environment
Benefits
  • The chance to jump into the trenches with an exceptional team that cares deeply about our work, planet and virtually all of its inhabitants
  • Very fine coffee, nutritious and utterly delicious snacks, catered lunches, and an awesome work environment a brisk dog's walk away from the beach
  • Truly competitive benefits and stock options in a fast growing start-up
